description: While individual actions can reduce personal carbon footprints, fighting climate change requires large-scale effort. Scroll on to find out how governments, companies and people like us can come together to make a difference.
title: Red alert! What can you do to help bring carbon emissions down?
title_page: Red alert! What can you do to help bring carbon emissions down? | The Straits Times
